contest-event.event-date:
May 4, 1912 D Stalybridge Contest
Stalybridge Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
stalybridge-contest
None
Maritana [unknown arranger]
Drill Hall, Walmsley Street, Stalybridge
1st prize £10 and 'British Bandsman' Cup. 2nd prize £5 and cornet valued £9.9s. 3rd prize £4. 4th prize £2. 5th prize £1. divided between Todmorden and Beswick.
Best soprano Pendleton Public Best cornet Pendleton Public. Best trombone Dobcross. Best euphonium Milnsbridge.
15 bands competed.
2nd annual contest organised by Stalybridge Old Band.
April 28, 2012, 10:20 a.m. Aug. 24, 2016, 10:38 p.m.
1 Pendleton Public J. Jennings
2 Dobcross Silver Band Charles Anderson
3 Milnsbridge Socialist (Huddersfield) Tom Eastwood
4 Scapegoat Hill Angus Holden
5 Todmorden Old Band William Halliwell
5 Beswick Prize John Fraser
Unknown Result Irwell Old Prize Band Tom Eastwood
